title: Condor Liberation services cancelled after mechanical issues
text:
Members of Guernsey States have met with senior managers of Condor Ferries.
It comes after Condor Liberation services were cancelled last weekend because of technical problems.
The meeting heard that many islanders and businesses were disappointed and angry with the service.
A 'rigourous' review looking at customer contact and improvements for passengers was agreed.
Condor say the meeting will help improve their services and they took the opportunity to apologise in person for the inconvenience caused to passengers.
The External Transport Group held the meeting, expressing their concern that this was the third time this year that the high speed ferry has been affected by technical failures.
Also discussed was the contingency plan that was in place and operational performance around the plan.
